PackageOracle.name: DA_PRODUCT_CAPABILITY
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PRODUCT_CAPABILITY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.09.720077000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,product_capability_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,product_capability_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_product_capability;

body.name: DA_PRODUCT_CAPABILITY
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PRODUCT_CAPABILITY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.09.729264000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,product_capability_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_product_capability.add, parms=' || product_id || '|' || product_capability_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_product_capability a
(
a.product_id
,a.product_capability_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.product_id
,add.product_capability_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_product_capability.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,product_capability_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_product_capability.del, parms=' || product_id || '|' || product_capability_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_product_capability a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.product_id = del.product_id
AND a.product_capability_type_cd = del.product_capability_type_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_product_capability.del');

END del;

END da_product_capability;
